Lunarpine found his way back to the stasis pod. he fumbled around 
returning the circuitry he'd removed until he got a slight power 
reading. The wolfbot hooked himself up hopeing that the pod had 
enough energy to sustain him. He hoped that the pod would emit a 
strong enough reading to attract Maximals. He hoped that they'd pick 
up the signal before the Preds.
